tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE OceanTemperatureData (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (timestamp, location)
)

CREATE TABLE Ocean_Temperature (
  Time TIMESTAMP,
  Temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE temperature_measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT,
    measurement_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    temperature_celsius DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES ocean_regions(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ecosystem_impacts (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT,
    species_id INT,
    impact_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES ocean_regions(region_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES marine_species(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ocean_temperature (
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (location, date)
)

CREATE TABLE marine_species (
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    habitat VARCHAR(255),
    population INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (species_name)
)

CREATE TABLE climate_impact (
    impact_type VARCHAR(255),
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (impact_type, date)
)

CREATE TABLE ecosystem_health (
    ecosystem_name VARCHAR(255),
    health_status VARCHAR(50),
    temperature FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (ecosystem_name)
)

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    date_collected DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (researcher_name, project_name)
)
